title: Corrigendum to “Optical Transitions of Tm3 + in Oxyfluoride Glasses and Compositional and Thermal Effect on Upconversion Luminescence of Tm3 +/Yb3 + -codoped Oxyfluoride Glasses” [Spectrochim. Acta A 118 (2014) 192–198]
